title: Building Footprints
description:
These footprint extents are collapsed from an earlier 3D building model provided by Pictometry of 2010, and have been refined from a version of building masses publicly available on the open data portal for over two years.The building masses were manually split with reference to parcel lines, but using vertices from the building mass wherever possible.These split footprints correspond closely to individual structures even where there are common walls; the goal of the splitting process was to divide the building mass wherever there was likely to be a firewall.
An arbitrary identifier was assigned based on a descending sort of building area for 177,023 footprints. The centroid of each footprint was used to join a property identifier from a draft of the San Francisco Enterprise GIS Program's cartographic base, which provides continuous coverage with distinct right-of-way areas as well as selected nearby parcels from adjacent counties. See accompanying document SF_BldgFoot_2017-05_description.pdf for more on methodology and motivation

columns.name: sf16_bldgid
columns.description: San Francisco Building ID using criteria of 2016-09, 6-char epoch, '.' , 7-char zero-padded AreaID or new ID in editing epochs after initial '201006.'

columns.name: area_id
columns.description: Epoch 2010.06 Shape_Area sort of 177,023 building polygons with area > ~1 sq m

columns.name: mblr
columns.description: San Francisco property key: Assessor's Map-Block-Lot of land parcel, plus Right-of-way area identifier derived from street Centerline Node Network (CNN)

columns.name: p2010_name
columns.description: Pictometry 2010 building name, if any

columns.name: p2010_zminn88ft
columns.description: Input building mass (of 2010,) minimum Z vertex elevation, NAVD 1988 ft

columns.name: p2010_zmaxn88ft
columns.description: Input building mass (of 2010,) maximum Z vertex elevation, NAVD 1988 ft

columns.name: gnd_cells50cm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, population of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_mincm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, minimum value of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_maxcm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, maximum value of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_rangecm

columns.name: gnd_meancm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, mean value of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, from integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_stdcm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, 1 standard deviation of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, centimeters

columns.name: gnd_varietycm
columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, count of unique values of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_majoritycm

columns.description: zonal statistic: LiDAR-derived ground surface grid, median value of 50cm square cells sampled in this building's zone, integer NAVD 1988 centimeters

columns.name: gnd_min_m
columns.description: summary statistic: zonal minimum ground surface height, NAVD 1988 meters

columns.name: median_1st_m
columns.description: summary statistic: zonal median first return surface height, NAVD 1988 meters

columns.name: hgt_median_m
columns.description: summary statistic: zonal median height surface value, meters

columns.name: gnd1st_delta
columns.description: summary statistic: discrete difference of (median first return surface -- minimum bare earth surface) for the building's zone, meters

columns.name: peak_1st_m
columns.description: summary statistic: highest cell value of first return surface in the building's zone, NAVD 1988 meters

columns.name: globalid
columns.description: Global Identifier

columns.name: shape
columns.description: Multi-Polygon geography

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal

queries.Monthly: SELECT mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id, date_trunc_ym(data_as_of) AS month, COUNT(*) AS building_count WHERE data_as_of >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id, month ORDER BY month, mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id
queries.Yearly: SELECT mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id, date_trunc_y(data_as_of) AS year, COUNT(*) AS building_count WHERE data_as_of >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id, year ORDER BY year, mblr, sf16_bldgid, area_id
